titles.title: To temporarily suspend the duty on certain piston engines entered on or before December 31, 1998.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on certain piston engines.
